forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 29. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 35. North wind 2 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 2pm, then rain likely and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 62. Southeast wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday

forecast.name: Thursday Night

forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers after 5am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 23, with temperatures rising to around 26 overnight. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 8am, then a chance of snow and a chance of freezing rain between 8am and 11am, then rain and a chance of freezing rain. Cloudy, with a high near 37. East wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Tuesday morning. Conditions are very good. The upper trails have the best conditions.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a nearly perfect ski day. The snow dried out thanks to the overnight cold. There is barely a cloud in the sky and sunshine is anticipated for the majority of the day. The temperature will rapidly increase today, and top out around 35 degrees. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
